message: Ouch.
Something sharp is poking me.

name: ベニ
message: "Wake up, you! Hey, get up!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ngh, ow..."

name: ベニ
message: "I said wake up! Or I'm gonna kick your ass!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...What the fuck?!"
I jump up. The thing that was poking my face tumbles off, and I catch it in midair.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Beni?"

name: ベニ
message: "Aagh, let go of me! Is this how you treat a guest?!"
Beni glares at me, flapping his wings against my hand.

name: 蒼葉
message: "So Koujaku's here?"

name: ベニ
message: "Of course he is! Let me go!"
I stand up, still clutching the shrieking Beni.
Huh? Where's Ren?
I find him curled up on a corner of my bed. He's in sleep mode.
Which reminds me. He said he'd lost some data. I've gotta take a look at him soon.
But first, food.
I'm feeling much better thanks to my nap. Even my headache is gone.
My joints still ache, but I can move.
When I leave my room, a delicious smell greets me from downstairs.
Granny is back. When I look down at my Coil, I realize it's already dinnertime.

name: 蒼葉
message: "How'd it get so late?"

name: ベニ
message: "You wouldn't get your ass out of bed, so I had to take matters into my own talons. You got that, punk?"
I ignore Beni's whining and poke my head into the dining room.
Granny is at the counter. Koujaku is sitting at the table.
He grins when he sees me.

name: 紅雀
message: "Mornin'."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Morning."

name: 紅雀
message: "I see you haven't lost your sunny disposition."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...No thanks to you."
I can't hold back a yawn.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Here."
I toss Beni across the room to Koujaku, who catches him easily.

name: ベニ
message: "I go out of my way to wake you up and this is how you treat me?! You better watch your back, Aoba!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Take it up with your master. He's the one who makes you run his errands."

name: 紅雀
message: "What do you expect? You're a pain in the ass when you wake up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I am not."

name: タエ
message: "If you're up, go set the table! Food's done!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Okay, okay."
While Koujaku laughs, I hurry to do Granny's bidding.

name: 紅雀
message: "Ms. Tae never changes. That booming voice of hers puts me right at ease."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You try getting yelled at every day. It's no cakewalk."

name: 紅雀
message: "Ahahahaha!"
I glare at him as I set the chopsticks out on the table. This only makes him laugh harder.
Granny brings over the food while I pour three cups of tea.
With dinner ready, I join everyone at the table.

name: タエ
message: "Thanks for the food."
Dinner tonight is blanched fish, konbu stir-fry, and pork belly.
I start with the pork belly. Delicious.
I find that food tastes especially good after I've had a nice nap.
To my right, Koujaku shoots Granny a smile.

name: 紅雀
message: "Absolutely delicious. Your cooking really is the greatest."

name: タエ
message: "Hmph. You come into my house uninvited and that's all you have to say?"

name: 紅雀
message: "I thought you knew I was coming. I told Aoba."
I glare at him again.

name: 蒼葉
message: "All you said was you'd swing by soon."

name: タエ
message: "And what's with you, sleeping like a log? I called and called and you wouldn't get up."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I... Okay, I guess you're right."

name: 紅雀
message: "You don't know how grateful I am to have a proper meal like this."

name: タエ
message: "Don't get the wrong idea! I just happened to have some food that was about to expire, that's all."

name: 紅雀
message: "That's why I love you."

name: タエ
message: "Shut up and eat!"
Granny stuffs kombu into her face while Koujaku watches with a smile.
Granny is actually surprisingly fond of Koujaku.
Even though Koujaku came to the island with his mother, when we were kids, he was alone more often than not.
That's why he spent so much time hanging out with me. And of course, he ate plenty of Granny's cooking too.
Knowing Granny, she might even think of him like a second grandson.

name: タエ
message: "Are you spending the night?"
Without missing a beat, Koujaku stops shoveling rice into his mouth and nods.

name: 紅雀
message: "That's the idea."

name: タエ
message: "Don't you have any shame?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Are you really surprised? Anyway, I have work tomorrow, so I'm gonna kick you out of bed in the morning even if you're sleeping."

name: 紅雀
message: "Don't you have that backwards? I'm always the one who wakes you up―gently, of course."

name: ベニ
message: "Got that right."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You guys..."
Koujaku flashes an infuriatingly charming smile and goes back to stuffing his face.
The banter continues until the food is gone.
